content: 1 and 3 needle 3 15 16 18 stitches should have the same amount of stitches beginning of round is at center bottom of heel join for working in the round being careful not to twist use yarn tail to visually mark the beginning of round gusset round 1 knit all stitches gusset round 2 knit to 3 stitches before end of needle work in ribbing of choice for 1 5 - i typically like a 1 x 1 k2tog k1 knit across needle 2 on needle 3 k1 ssk 1 rib for sock cuffs knit to end of round once ribbing is complete work in stockinette stitch repeat rounds 1 and 2 a total of 10 11 13 times - 15 knit every round until sock measures 6 6 5 - 7 from 16 18 stitches on each gusset needle needles 1 cast on edge the leg length is completely up to you and 3 and 30 32 36 stitches for top of foot needle stop when the leg is the length you like it 2 heel flap continue working without decreasing until foot the slipped stitch heel flap is worked back and forth measures approx 1 5 1 5 2 less than desired length on needle 1 only toe row 1 rs sl1 k1 15 16 18 times round 1 knit to 3 stitches before end of needle 1 row 2 ws sl1 purl to end of needle k2tog k1 on needle 2 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of needle k2tog k1 on needle 3 k1 ssk knit to repeat row 1 and 2 15 16 18 times 15 16 18 end of round slipped stitches along side of heel flap round 2 knit all stitches in round gusset repeat rounds 1 and 2 until there are 20 24 28 total row 1 rs sl1 k16 17 19 ssk k1 turn stitches remaining knit across needle 1 and slip those row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn stitches onto needle 3 cut yarn leaving a 12 tail row 3 sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn using kitchener stitch graft toe closed row 4 sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn finishing continue in this manner working 1 more stitch before weave in ends repeat for second sock and voila decrease each row until all heel stitches have been worked - 18 18 20 stitches remain knit across these stitches next place 30 32 36 held foot stitches on one dpn this will be needle 2 © tanis fiber arts 2019 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com
